rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Prince Adel, Laura-sama, the number
of your supporters grows with each
day, or so I perceive it.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Of course you've always had excellent
character, Prince Adel, but I have
been worried about you at times.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0003
rows.name:
You often seemed distant, tormented, as
if you felt that you could never share
the burden but had to shoulder it alone.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0004
rows.name:
And so I remained close by, so that
whatever happened, you would have a
shoulder to lean on if you needed it.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But then came the day that Laura-sama
was officially bestowed with the most
honorable title of knight of Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Ever since then, it seems to me you've
opened your heart a little and learnt
to draw strength from your companions.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Yes, we owe a great deal to Laura-sama,
to whom you entrusted Lord Shin, in
whom you have such great faith.

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0008
rows.name: What's that? Am I rambling again?

rows.label: tlk70000027_05_msg0009
rows.name:
I could go on for much
longer, you know. I haven't
said the half of it!
